content.html: If I choose to not engage with you on one social media platform repeatedly reaching out to me on multiple platforms is a form of harassment. Me not responding to you is not a cybercrime. Sharing my private information online without my permission is a crime though.
content.value:
If I choose to not engage with you on one social media platform repeatedly reaching out to me on multiple platforms is a form of harassment. 

Me not responding to you is not a cybercrime. 

Sharing my private information online without my permission is a crime though.
